| HistoryText             = When the [[Adriana Soria (Earth-616)|Queen]] sought the [[Miles Warren (Jackal Clone 3) (Earth-616)|Jackal]]'s help to take over the world, he created numerous clones of himself to assist him in the creation of [[Spider-Virus|a virus]] that would allow her to do so.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 666}}

After the Jackal failed to stop [[Horizon Labs (Earth-616)|Horizon Labs]] from creating a cure for the [[Spider-Virus]] through the [[Anti-Venom (Symbiote) (Earth-616)|Anti-Venom symbiote]], many of his clones were killed by the Spider-Queen.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 670|671}}

Following the Queen's death, a team of clones led by [[Miles Warren (Earth-616)|the real Jackal]] collected DNA samples from her corpse.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 673}}

===Alpha===
When the Jackal took interest in the new young hero known as [[Andrew Maguire (Earth-616)|Alpha]] for his connection to Parker, two clones of him dressed as Jackals were sent to kidnap the teen in order to clone him and have [[Alpha-Males (Earth-616)|his clones]] mate with the [[Spider Queens (Earth-616)|Spider Queens]] (clones of Adriana Soria) to create a powerful army under the Jackal's control. However, to Warren's disappointment, Alpha's clones didn't have any of his powers as the accident that gave them to him did not alter his DNA. Seeing that would lead them to nowhere, one of the Jackal clones pressed a red button that destroyed all the clones present, including himself.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 692|693}}

===Sibling Rivalry===
One of Miles' clones assisted him in the creation of the [[Mutant-Powered Spider-Clones (Earth-616)|Mutant-Powered Spider-Clones]] and in the capture of both [[Otto Octavius (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] and [[Kaine Parker (Earth-616)|Scarlet Spider]].{{r|Superior Spider-Man Team-Up Vol 1 1|2}} The clone was eventually killed by the Scarlet Spider.{{r|Scarlet Spider Vol 2 20}}

===[[Dead No More: The Clone Conspiracy]]===
A new batch of Miles Warren clones was created by [[Benjamin Reilly (Earth-616)|Ben Reilly]] to trick the real one into thinking he was a clone as punishment for using him to find a cure for the cellular degradation caused by his new cloning procedure. They were convinced to work for Reilly as payment for [[New U Pills|the pills]] he devised to keep their cellular degeneration at bay. With their assistance, Reilly built [[New U Technologies (Earth-616)|New U Technologies]] in hopes of using their cloning technology for good.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 22}}

All of them died due to a signal set off by Reilly to destabilize the bodies of New U's clones worldwide, and cause a [[Carrion Virus]] outbreak with the intention of bringing every single person back as a clone once they had died.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 24}}

==Weaknesses==
'''Pill Dependence:''' In order to prevent their bodies from breaking down due to the cellular degradation caused by a flaw in [[Miles Warren (Earth-616)|Miles Warren]]'s new cloning process, the New U batch of clones had to ingest daily [[New U Pills|a pill]] provided by [[Benjamin Reilly (Earth-616)|Ben Reilly]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 22}}
